1561491187_12X6g1LP25pT2XEMNR239xgrUnEkt.body:
> [anonymouslogin](#comment_366_17AMQVbBa12XB3xFWKDnP2dCEx92TaiY7X): The fundamental problem with Bitcoin as a currency is the lack of fungibility. Currency can't have a legacy that is traceable and that is what makes Bitcoin a security, and a damn good one. Monero or ZCash are better currencies because with encryption and anonymous options they are fungible. Dash is in the running too, but has a few centralization issues.

He is right but it is not just bitcoin that is the only crypto currency.
